#summary XCount(...)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [count count()] for more info. Replace `X` with the name of an association you have set up either through [belongsTo belongsTo()], [hasMany hasMany()] or [hasOne hasOne()].

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset aCustomer = model("customer").findByKey(1)>
<cfset theCount = aCustomer.orderCount()>
=
<cfset theCount = model("order").count(where="customerId=#params.customerId#")>
}}}
